/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is flanked by lush greenery, with trees and shrubs lining both sides, providing a vibrant contrast to the urban environment. Buildings of various sizes and designs can be seen in the background, indicating a mix of residential and commercial structures. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene.
